title: Lonely No More
lyrics:
[intro] (Am)  (Dm)  (F)  (E)
 
(Am) Now it seems to me, that you (Dm)know just what to say
(F) But words are only (E)words, can you show me something else?
(Am) Can you swear to me, that you'll  (Dm)always be this way
(F)Show me how you feel (E) more than ever, baby (E-single stum)(baby, baby, baby, baby)
 
[chorus]
(Am) Well, I don't wanna be (Dm)lonely no more (Oh-oh)
(G) I don't wanna have to (C)pay for (G)this (Oh-oh)
(Am) I don't want another (Dm)lover at my (G)door
It's just another (C)heartache (G)on my list
(Am) I don't wanna be (Dm)angry no more (Oh-oh)
(G) You know I could never (C)stand for (G)this (Oh-oh)
(Am) So when you tell me that you (Dm)love me, know for (G)sure
I don't wanna be (C)lonely (G)anymore
(Am) Oh-Oh-Oh (Dm) Oh-Oh-Oh (G) Oh-Oh-Oh (E) Oh-Oh-Oh  x2
(Am) Now it's hard for me, when my (Dm)heart's still on the mend
(F)Open up to me (E-single strum) Like you do your girlfriends
                          
(Am) And you sing to me and it's (Dm)harmony, Girl, what you do to me is everything
(F)Make me say anything just to get you back again (E)Why can't we just try
[chorus]
(Am) Well, I don't wanna be (Dm)lonely no more (Oh-oh)
(G) I don't wanna have to (C)pay for (G)this (Oh-oh)
(Am) I don't want another (Dm)lover at my (G)door
It's just another (C)heartache (G)on my list
(Am) I don't wanna be (Dm)angry no more (Oh-oh)
(G) You know I could never (C)stand for (G)this (Oh-oh)
(Am) So when you tell me that you (Dm)love me, know for (G)sure
I don't wanna be (C)lonely (G)anymore
(Am) Oh-Oh-Oh (Dm) Oh-Oh-Oh (G) Oh-Oh-Oh (E) Oh-Oh-Oh  x2
What if I was (Dm)good to you
What if you were (Am)good to me
What if I could (Dm)hold you 'till I (G)feel you move in(Am)side of me           
What if it was (Dm)paradise
What if we were (Am)symphonies
(Dm)What if I gave (F)all my life to (G)find some way to (E)stand beside you
 
[chorus]
(Am) Well, I don't wanna be (Dm)lonely no more (Oh-oh)
(G) I don't wanna have to (C)pay for (G)this (Oh-oh)
(Am) I don't want another (Dm)lover at my (G)door
It's just another (C)heartache (G)on my list
(Am) I don't wanna be (Dm)angry no more (Oh-oh)
(G) You know I could never (C)stand for (G)this (Oh-oh)
(Am) So when you tell me that you (Dm)love me, know for (G)sure
I don't wanna be (C)lonely (G)anymore
(Am) Oh-Oh-Oh (Dm) Oh-Oh-Oh (G) Oh-Oh-Oh (E) Oh-Oh-Oh  x2
 
[outro - continue “Oh-Oh-Oh”]
(Am) I don't wanna be (Dm)lonely anymore
(G) I don't wanna be (E)lonely no more
(Am) I don't wanna be (Dm)lonely no more
(G) I don't wanna be (E)lonely anymore (Am-single strum) [end]
